Name: equityticker
Comment: Unique identifier for the stock

Name: 50dma
Comment: The average closing price over the past 50 trading days

Name: 200dma
Comment: The average closing price over the past 200 trading days

Name: macd
Comment: Moving Average Convergence Divergence (momentum indicator)

Name: prevdate
Comment: The date of the previous data point

Name: date
Comment: The date associated with the data point

Name: 3dma
Comment: The average closing price over the past 3 trading days

Name: 7dma
Comment: The average closing price over the past 7 trading days

Name: macdprev
Comment: The MACD value from the previous data point

Name: macdchange
Comment: The change in MACD value since the previous data point

Name: dmadiff
Comment: The difference between shorter and longer DMAs (e.g., 50dma - 200dma)

Name: 3dmaweekly
Comment: The average weekly closing price over the past 3 weeks

Name: 7dmaweekly
Comment: The average weekly closing price over the past 7 weeks

Name: 50dmaweekly
Comment: The average weekly closing price over the past 50 weeks

Name: 200dmaweekly
Comment: The average weekly closing price over the past 200 weeks

Name: macdweekly
Comment: MACD calculated over a weekly timeframe

Name: macdprevweekly
Comment: The previous week's MACD value

Name: macdchangeweekly
Comment: The change in MACD value since the previous week

Name: dmadiffweekly
Comment: The difference between shorter and longer weekly DMAs

Name: dmadiffprev
Comment: DMA difference value of the previous data point

Name: dmadiffweeklyprev
Comment: The DMA difference value from two weeks ago

Name: macdweeklyprev
Comment: The MACD value from two weeks ago

Name: dma3prev
Comment: The 3-day moving average calculated two data points in the past

Name: dma3weeklyprev
Comment: The weekly 3-day moving average calculated two weeks ago

Name: momo
Comment: Rate of change of price for a specific (short) period

Name: momoweekly
Comment: Rate of change of price over a weekly timeframe

Name: 3dmamonthly
Comment: Monthly 3-Day Moving Average

Name: 7dmamonthly
Comment: Monthly 7-Day Moving Average

Name: dma3monthlyprev
Comment: Monthly 3-DMA (Prev. Month)

Name: macdmonthly
Comment: Monthly MACD

Name: macdmonthlyprev
Comment: Monthly Previous MACD

Name: dmadiffmonthly
Comment: Monthly DMA Difference

Name: 50dmamonthly
Comment: Monthly 50-Day Moving Average

Name: dmadiffmonthlyprev
Comment: Prev. Month's DMA Difference

Name: momomonthly
Comment: Monthly Momentum

Name: 13dma
Comment: 13-Day Moving Average

Name: 13dmaweekly
Comment: Weekly 13-Day Moving Average

Name: 13dmamonthly
Comment: Monthly 13-Day Moving Average

Name: dma13prev
Comment: 13-Day Moving Average (Prev. Period)

Name: dma13weeklyprev
Comment: Weekly 13-DMA (Prev. Week)

Name: dma13monthlyprev
Comment: Monthly 13-DMA (Prev. Month)

Name: dma3prevprev
Comment: The 3-day moving average calculated three data points in the past

Name: dma3weeklyprevprev
Comment: The weekly 3-day moving average calculated three weeks ago

Name: score
Comment: Calculated score, potentially combining technical factors

Name: scoreprev
Comment: The custom score from the previous data point

Name: scoredate
Comment: The date on which the custom score was calculated

Name: dyna3dma
Comment: Moving average with length adjusted based on volatility

Name: dyna3dmaweekly
Comment: The dynamic 3-day moving average value every week

Name: dyna3dmaprev
Comment: The dynamic 3-day moving average value from the previous data point

Name: dyna3dmaweeklyprev
Comment: The previous week's dynamic 3-day moving average

Name: scorediff
Comment: The change in the custom score since the previous data point

Name: scorelast
Comment: The most recent value of the custom score
